LANDING_PAGE_ANNOUNCEMENT_TEXT: Ready to rock the trading world? Join our beta now!
LANDING_PAGE_HERO_TEXT: Trade Rocks. Get Rich. Have Fun.
LANDING_PAGE_SUB_HERO_TEXT: Welcome to the ultimate rock trading simulation game where geology meets economics. Collect, trade, and profit from virtual rocks in a dynamic marketplace.
FEATURE_1_BODY: Unearth unique and valuable rocks from various virtual locations. Each discovery is a thrilling surprise!
FEATURE_2_BODY: Experience a dynamic trading system where rock values fluctuate based on rarity and player demand.
FEATURE_3_BODY: Curate an impressive assortment of rocks, from common pebbles to exotic minerals. Become a renowned collector!
FEATURE_4_BODY: Hone your trading skills by negotiating deals with other players. Buy low, sell high, and maximize your profits!
FEATURE_5_BODY: Combine different rocks to create new, rare specimens. Experiment with countless combinations for surprising results!
FEATURE_6_BODY: Compete with players worldwide to become the top rock trader. Climb the ranks and showcase your geological prowess!
HERO_TITLE: Rock 'n' Trade: The Ultimate Stone Market Simulator

STARTER_TEMPLATE_APPLICATION_NAME: RockEx: The Random Rock Trading Extravaganza
PLACEHOLDER_FAQ_TITLE: Frequently Asked Questions About Our Rock Trading Game
ACCORDION_QUESTION_1: How do I start playing the rock trading game?
ACCORDION_ANSWER_1: To begin playing our rock trading game, simply create an account, choose your starting rocks, and start trading with other players. The game is easy to learn but offers endless strategic possibilities!
ACCORDION_QUESTION_2: Are there different types of rocks in the game?
ACCORDION_ANSWER_2: Yes! Our game features a wide variety of rocks, each with unique properties and values. From common pebbles to rare gemstones, you'll discover an exciting array of tradable rocks as you play.
ACCORDION_QUESTION_3: How does the trading system work?
ACCORDION_ANSWER_3: The trading system is based on player-to-player interactions. You can propose trades, negotiate deals, and exchange rocks with other players. The value of each rock is determined by its rarity and demand within the game's economy.
ACCORDION_QUESTION_4: Can I earn real money from playing this game?
ACCORDION_ANSWER_4: While our rock trading game is designed for fun and entertainment, it does not involve real money transactions. The in-game currency and rock values are purely virtual and intended for gameplay purposes only.
CTA_BODY: Enter the wild world of rock trading, where geodes become gold and pebbles are precious!
CTA_CONTENT_SUBTITLE: Trade, Collect, and Conquer the Rock Market
FAQ_SUBTITLE_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: Everything you need to know about our rock-solid trading game
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_1: What is the Random Rock Trading Game?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_1: It's an exciting game where players trade virtual rocks with randomly generated characteristics. Each rock has unique properties, making every trade a thrilling gamble!
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_2: Simply sign up, claim your starter set of rocks, and dive into the rocky marketplace. You can trade with other players or try your luck with random rock draws.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_3: Are some rocks more valuable than others?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_3: Absolutely! Rarity, size, color, and special features all contribute to a rock's value. Part of the fun is discovering which characteristics are most sought after by other players.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_4: Can I earn real money playing this game?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_4: While the primary focus is on fun and in-game trading, some players have found success in selling rare rocks for real money on third-party marketplaces. However, this is not guaranteed or endorsed by the game.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_5: Is there a limit to how many rocks I can own?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_5: There's no hard limit on rock ownership, but managing a large collection can be challenging. We recommend focusing on quality over quantity to maximize your trading potential.
PAGE_DETAIL_1_VALUE: Discover and trade a wide variety of unique, randomly generated rocks with different properties and rarity levels.
PAGE_DETAIL_2_VALUE: Engage in a thrilling economy where rock values fluctuate based on rarity, demand, and player-driven trends.
PAGE_DETAIL_3_VALUE: Hone your trading skills, predict market shifts, and build your rock empire through smart exchanges and savvy negotiations.
STARTER_TEMPLATE_FOOTER_CONTENT: © 2023 RockEx. All rights reserved. Trade responsibly. Past performance of rocks does not guarantee future results.

TESTIMONIAL_SECTION_SUBTITLE_PLACEHOLDER: Discover why gamers are raving about our random rock trading experience
TESTIMONIAL_1_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: This game rocks! I never thought trading virtual stones could be so addictive. It's like a geological stock market!
TESTIMONIAL_2_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: The randomness keeps me coming back for more. I've learned so much about different types of rocks while having a blast!
TESTIMONIAL_3_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: Who knew pebbles could be so precious? This game is a gem in the rough of mobile gaming!
